original: While the text, consisting entirely of the subtitles, is mostly harmless, the movie shows a brain, killer robots and guns
This will be a line-by-line translation of the subtitles of the movie
Sintel is a movie created as a result of the Blender open movie project "Mango" and is released under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 license.
